data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Kizilsu Kirghiz, Xinjiang Uygur, China will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kizilsu Kirghiz, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kizilsu Kirghiz, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 29,078 believers in Kizilsu Kirghiz to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 354,222 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Kizilsu Kirghiz, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kyrgyz people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kyrgyz people.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of Kizilsu Kirghiz against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Kizilsu Kirghiz to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kizilsu Kirghiz, Xinjiang Uygur, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
